contents:
妥妥的將中文直白翻譯成英文

这个是一个expat写的，不是中国人，看名字好像是哈萨克斯坦人。

如果是典型的那些我遇到的英语极差的中国在英留学生的话大概是这样的

I united quarantined by govement. Survive in this place is not possible. What do they think? i am not animal. Nobody can call food, they give us rubbish. Even water. We cannot call food outside. They don't give us water.
